coreAttributes.name: Black Rat's Rum
coreAttributes.description: A glass bottle of 'Black Rat's Rum', filled with orange-coloured alcohol. The label on the front shows an image of a black-furred rat-boy wearing a thief's mask, who's pinning a rat-girl against a wall as he fucks her from behind.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A powerful wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.5)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unscrew)] the cap from the bottle of Black Rat's Rum, before tilting [npc.her] head back and gulping down the alcoholic liquid. Quickly polishing off the entire bottle, [npc.nameIsFull] left with a faint, musky aftertaste in [npc.her] mouth.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unscrew)] the cap from the bottle of Black Rat's Rum, before bringing it up to [npc2.namePos] waiting [npc2.lips] and getting [npc2.herHim] to gulp down the alcoholic liquid. Quickly polishing off the entire bottle, [npc2.nameIsFull] left with a faint, musky aftertaste in [npc2.her] mouth.
